question: [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/ConsensusCommandGeneration/SideChainConsensusBehaviourProvider.cs] [Function: Constructor] [Input Validation] Can the constructor accept a null Round object, and if so, does this cause the base class GetConsensusBehaviour() to fail when accessing CurrentRound.RealTimeMinersInformation causing consensus halt?
